topic.body: ZeroTalk cloned by anglosaxon for privacy conversations. http://127.0.0.1:43110/16sMXQo6WghvMdzaRCco85kchKPknXZ4wY/

1547518888_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehE.body:
> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_34_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): Wondering how good this file sharing works across major web browsers. I had webtorrent app on my Windows PC and while using OpenVPN i had closed port and i think peers with closed (filtered, firewalled) port was unable to connect to me. Though it is the same for classic torrent i think.

It works across major browsers fine due to using WebRTC.
